body.name: Aeropress Go Travel Coffee Press Kit - 3 in 1 brew method combines French Press, Pourover, Espresso - without grit or bitterness - Small portable Full bodied coffee maker for camping & travel

features: An Amazing Cup, Now On The Go: Take the AeroPress Go with you and enjoy a truly delicious coffee wherever you go. The AeroPress Go is slightly smaller than the AeroPress Original, but can still produce 1-3 servings of espresso style coffee, and it features a handy mug and lid that double as a traveling case, making it perfect for the office, traveling, camping, boating and more

All About Taste & Practicality: The AeroPress Go travel coffee maker brews smooth, delicious coffee without bitterness or grit, unlike other methods like french press. There's no experience necessary for brewing with AeroPress Go; with a brewing time of just a minute, AeroPress is all about making it easy to brew delicious coffee wherever you are

Be Your Own Barista: The AeroPress Go is a new way of brewing coffee that delivers a delicious result in just under a minute. You can choose to brew hot coffee or espresso, or use cold water to make cold brew in two minutes. Tweak your combinations and find the right spot for you – with the AeroPress Go, you have total control over your coffee

How to Use: Just add coffee and water, stir, and press! Easily makes 8 oz (237ml) of regular coffee or 1 to 3 espresso style shots for use in lattes, cappuccinos, and other espresso-based drinks per pressing in about a minute. We recommend a medium-fine grind, but vary your recipes however you choose!

About AeroPress: Smart design and creativity have always been the heart of what we do, and we are now squarely focused on inspiring even more coffee lovers around the world to revolutionize their coffee routine. Designed in Silicon Valley, Made in the USA, Materials used in AeroPress coffee makers are free of BPA and phthalates

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Includes the AeroPress Go chamber and plunger, filter cap, scoop, stirrer, paper micro-filters, a filter holder, and a mug and lid that doubles as a traveling case.

Easily makes 8oz (237ml) of regular coffee or three espresso-style shots per pressing in about a minute. Make yourself a delicious cold brew in just two minutes! Perfect for espresso-style coffee! Prepare lattes, cappuccinos, and other espresso-based drinks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aeropress: The American French Press!
reviews.reviewText: It's been three years since I bought this Aeropress, almost to the day. Happy Anniversary, beautiful! I love you and I can't imagine my life without you 😅 Sorry, I drifted there for a second 😂Before Aeropress, I used a French press. It was part of my morning rituals: grind the beans, boil the water, pour and let it sit, press, and voilà, you got coffee. I enjoyed that. What I didn't enjoy, though, was the sediment and the cleanup! Enter, Aeropress 🤩Pros 👍👍👍- Compact and portable.- Consistently good coffee, every time (once you've dialed it in to your preferences).- Easy to use. Personally, I use the inverted method.- Easy to clean. You end up with a neat little puck. Toss, rinse and repeat!- Economical: minimum waste in paper, coffee, time, and energy!- Lasts for ever! See photos of mine, three years later, of almost daily use.- S, M and XL: Aeropress now comes in your choice of small (Go), medium (Original), and even XL!Cons 👎👎👎- Honestly, not much to complain about. This invention is near perfect!- OK, the paper filter holder is just too small to be useful!- Also, I wish the Aeropress logo was embossed and not just printed, but this is nitpick territory!My Verdict 🧐My first reaction to using my Aeropress was that this is the best thing that’s happened to coffee since 1852 (the year the first French Press was patented). I love mine, and I'm sure you will fall in love with yours. Trust me, you need this in your life!One more thing: If I have to buy it again, I would certainly go with the Original Aeropress. I honestly think it's just as compact and travel-friendly. Besides, I don't care for any of the other accessories, like the cup or the foldable stirrer!I hope my review has helped you make a more informed buying decision 👍😊✌️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Travel Companion for Coffee Lovers!
reviews.reviewText: The Aeropress Go Travel Coffee Press Kit is an absolute game-changer for coffee enthusiasts on the go! As someone who appreciates a good cup of joe, I cannot recommend this portable coffee maker enough. It effortlessly combines three brewing methods - French Press, Pourover, and Espresso - resulting in a full-bodied and delicious coffee, free from any unwanted grit or bitterness.One of the standout features of the Aeropress Go is how incredibly easy it is to use. The entire brewing process takes only a few minutes, making it perfect for those busy mornings or when you're out camping and need a quick caffeine fix. Simply add your preferred coffee grounds, pour in hot water, and let the Aeropress Go work its magic. The result? A consistently flavorful and smooth cup of coffee that rivals any café-brewed beverage.Clean-up has never been easier! The compact design of the Aeropress Go ensures that it doesn't take up much space, and disassembling and cleaning the components is a breeze. Whether you're traveling or just want a hassle-free brewing experience at home, this coffee press kit makes your life so much simpler.Another fantastic advantage of the Aeropress Go is its portability. It's specifically designed for travel, meaning it easily fits into your backpack or luggage without adding unnecessary bulk or weight. Whether you're camping, hiking, or embarking on a business trip, this little coffee maker is a trusty companion that allows you to enjoy your favorite brew wherever you go.In conclusion, the Aeropress Go Travel Coffee Press Kit is a must-have for coffee lovers who are always on the move. With its versatility, ease of use, quick brewing time, effortless cleanup, and portability, it ticks all the boxes. Treat yourself to a perfect cup of coffee every time, no matter where you are. Invest in the Aeropress Go and never settle for subpar coffee again. Happy sipping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for on the go
reviews.reviewText: Title: A Compact Powerhouse for On-the-Go Brewing - Aeropress Go ReviewRating: ★★★★★ (5/5)The Aeropress Go is the epitome of portability without sacrificing the quality of your coffee. This innovative coffee maker has quickly become an essential companion for any coffee lover on the move. As a proud owner of the Aeropress Go, I can attest to its superior construction and thoughtful design.**Quality of Construction: 5/5**From the moment I unboxed the Aeropress Go, I was struck by the excellent quality of its construction. It's evident that the manufacturers paid meticulous attention to detail. The materials used feel durable and capable of withstanding the rigors of travel. Every piece of this brewing system exudes reliability, and I'm confident it will last for years.**Compact and Portable: 5/5**The true genius of the Aeropress Go lies in its compact design. This coffee maker is tailor-made for those who value a quality brew while constantly on the go. It neatly disassembles into its individual components, which then fit snugly inside its travel mug. The result is a highly packable and incredibly space-efficient coffee maker that can effortlessly accompany you on your adventures. I particularly appreciate how it all fits together in a single, easy-to-pack container. It's a godsend for travelers and outdoor enthusiasts.**The Perfect Filter Holder: 5/5**One of the standout features of the Aeropress Go is its ingeniously designed filter holder. It's not just good; it's perfect. This little accessory makes a significant difference in practicality. Not only does it keep your filters clean and organized, but it also ensures they're always within reach when you need them. It's a small detail that reflects the thought and care put into the product's design.But the true magic of the Aeropress Go lies in the coffee it brews. It manages to deliver a smooth, rich, and flavorful cup of coffee in just a matter of minutes, whether you're in a cozy kitchen or braving the elements in the great outdoors. The versatility of this coffee maker is astounding, and it can accommodate various brewing methods, allowing you to experiment and find your perfect cup of joe.In conclusion, the Aeropress Go is an absolute gem for coffee aficionados who crave quality coffee no matter where life takes them. Its top-notch construction, remarkable portability, and thoughtful features, such as the perfect filter holder, make it a must-have for anyone who wants to brew an exceptional cup of coffee on the go. With this brilliant piece of coffee-making equipment in your backpack or suitcase, you'll never have to compromise on your daily caffeine fix, whether you're in the wilderness or navigating the urban jungle.

Es muy práctica y fácil de usar, se nota la diferencia al preparar el café, lo llevo a todos lados para no dejar de tomar mis cafes deliciosos por las mañanas. No ocupa mucho espacio. Si eres amantes de café y viajas mucho, super recomendado!

Possuo uns 8 métodos diferentes de café. A Aeropress é com certeza meu favorito! Muito domínio das variáveis, portátil, várias receitas e extremamente fácil de limpar.Pela diferença de preço, acho que o modelo GO vale muito a pena.

I’m very glad I bought this for camping. It’s compact, unbreakable, and stores away small for travel. Very easy to use and clean. It makes a great strong coffee—not quite espresso, but a good wake up coffee nonetheless.Don’t hesitate. Buy now!
Leggerissima, facile da utilizzare e pulire, prepara un caffè di gran qualità. I dischetti di carta possono essere sostituti con i filtri in metallo, consigliati anche quelli!
